type: Legendary Creature – Minion Cleric Lord Noble
rules_text:
Ward {4} [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {4}.)[/i]
[i]Duma Witch[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice another creature. If you do, exile it from your graveyard and put a soul counter on it, then each opponent loses life equal to that creatures power.
[i]Greater Good[/i] – Whenever Celica, Puppet of Duma dies, return each creature card you own in exile with soul counters on them to the battlefield tapped.
